us.codecraft.webmagic.processor

接口 PageProcessor

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AlexanderMcqueenGoodsProcessor, AmanzonPageProcessor, AngularJSProcessor, BaiduBaikePageProcessor, CompositePageProcessor, ConfigurablePageProcessor, DiandianBlogProcessor, DiaoyuwengProcessor, F58PageProcesser, FileCache, GithubRepoPageMapper, GithubRepoPageProcessor, GithubRepoPageProcessor, HuxiuProcessor, InfoQMiniBookProcessor, IteyeBlogProcessor, KaichibaProcessor, MamacnPageProcessor, MeicanProcessor, NjuBBSProcessor, OschinaBlogPageProcesser, OschinaPageProcesser, PhantomJSPageProcessor, QzoneBlogProcessor, ScriptProcessor, SimplePageProcessor, SinaBlogProcessor, TianyaPageProcesser, ZhihuPageProcessor, ZhihuPageProcessor, ZipCodePageProcessor

    public interface PageProcessor
    Interface to be implemented to customize a crawler.

    In PageProcessor, you can customize:
    start urls and other settings in Site
    how the urls to fetch are detected
    how the data are extracted and stored
    从以下版本开始:
    0.1.0
    作者:
    code4crafter@gmail.com
    另请参阅:
    Site, Page

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Site getSite()
      get the site settings
      void process(Page page)
      process the page, extract urls to fetch, extract the data and store

    • 方法详细资料

      • process

        void process(Page page)
        process the page, extract urls to fetch, extract the data and store
        参数:
        page - page

      • getSite

        Site getSite()
        get the site settings
        返回:
        site
